#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

#define mod  1000000007

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long dp[501][501];
	long long ans;
	int t, n, h, l;
	
	memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));
	
	dp[0][0] = 1;
	
	for(int i = 0; i <= 500; i++) {
		dp[1][i] = 1;
	}
	
	for(int i = 2; i <= 500; i++) {
		
		dp[i][1] = 1;
		dp[i][i] = 1;
		
		for(int j = i + 1; j <= 500; j++) {
			
			dp[i][j] = dp[i][j - 1] + dp[i - 1][j - 1];
			dp[i][j] = dp[i][j]%mod;
		}
	}
	
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--) {
		
		scanf("%d %d %d", &n, &l, &h);
		ans =  0;
		for(int i =l; i <= h; i++) {
			ans = (ans + dp[i][n])%mod;
		}
		
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
	
	return 0;
	
}
